moves.4. Qf3 e6: Make way for KB & cover QB
moves.6. Nh3 Nxd4: Another free pawn, and threaten the black Q
moves.8. Qxd4 Qb4+: Give check and offer Q exchange
moves.9. Qd2 Qe4+: Give check and win a rook for bishop
moves.17. f3 Qd4 18. Ng5 Qxe5+: Give check, take material. Lather, rinse, repeat.
moves.19. Be2 Qxg5 20. Rc1 Qh4+ 21. Kd1 Qxh2 2: Time to swap queens, and look to promote a pawn
DOH! 40. Na3 costs my rook for a knight
moves.40. Kf1 bxc5: Wins knight for pawn, and opens b-file for rook
moves.41. bxc5 Rb2 42. Re1 Rh4 43. Rd1 Rxf4+: 44. Ke1 = Mate in 1; Bf3 = Mate in 2
